'Adult conversation' needed on PPE

articles.title: Coronavirus: Plane carrying PPE kits arrives in Scotland from China - BBC News
articles.description: The cargo includes face masks, virus kits and infusion pumps for intensive care units.
articles.content:
Image copyrightNHS National Services ScotlandImage caption
 The cargo arrived from China at Prestwick Airport
A plane carrying new equipment for the NHS - including 10 million face masks - has landed in Scotland from China.

articles.author: Michael Sherin
articles.title: Scots care home worker speaks out on staff 'fear' and says UK health minister Matt Hancock is in denial - The Times
articles.description: The care home that I work in had its first death from Covid-19 two days ago. The resident had been there a matter of weeks. She had been released into the home from hospital — without being tested.
articles.content:
The care home that I work in had its first death from Covid-19 two days ago. The resident had been there a matter of weeks. She had been released into the home from hospital without being tested.

articles.author: Emily Ferguson
articles.title: Coronavirus warning: WHO warns 'no evidence' people who survive COVID-19 develop immunity - Express.co.uk
articles.description: THE World Health Organization has warned there is 'no evidence' to suggest people who have recovered from coronavirus have developed immunity, prompting fears people could catch COVID-19 more than once.
